name: Maple Syrup Pie
description: This Québécois recipe first appeared in 1987 with a story on maple syrup production in Canada and New England. Using genuine maple syrup in a recipe is admittedly a splurge. But it's a delectable one.
keywords: dessert, heavy cream, maple syrup, pie shell, nut-free

recipeInstructions.text: Beat eggs until well-blended. Beat in maple syrup and butter. Pour the mixture into the baked pie shell, place in the oven and bake 25 minutes, just until the filling is set.
Serve while still warm with whipped cream.
